findings.title: Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead, and increases gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code can make a contract more difficult to understand and maintain, and can also increase the size of the contract and the cost of deploying and interacting with it.

findings.title: Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured on user-supplied input without proper checks for zero values.
